String.Link: Távolítsa el az összes tömörített fájlt (kompatibilitási probléma esetén).

String.Target: 将现有的系统备份为WIM或者ESD（如果文件存在则自动增量到原有文件）。

String.Link: Az operációs rendszer visszaállítása meglévő lemezképfájlból (WIM/ESD)

String.Target: Dism++不允许修改文件名，这将导致插件无法正常加载。
String.Link: A Dism++ nem teszi lehetővé a fájlnév módosítását, mert a bővítményt nem sikerül betölteni.

String.Target: 无法启动Dism++x64.exe，请确保该Dism++组件的完整性。
String.Link: A Dism++ x64.exe nem indul el, ellenőrizze a Dism++ komponenseket.

String.Target: Dism++关键组件丢失，请从 www.chuyu.me 重新下载Dism++。
String.Link: Egy Dism++ kritikus fájl hiányzik, kérjük, töltse le újra a Dism++ alkalmazást a www.chuyu.me webhelyről.

String.Target: 临时目录可用空间不足5GB，这可能导致Dism++无法正常运行，推荐将Dism++复制到可用空间大于5GB的驱动器，然后继续。
String.Link: Az átmeneti könyvtár kisebb, mint 5 GB, a Dism++ nem működik megfelelően. Javasoljuk, hogy másolja a Dism++ meghajtót 5 GB-nál nagyobb szabad területre, majd folytassa.

String.Target: 基础支撑库缺失，引导修复相关功能无法使用。
String.Link: Az alapvető támogató könyvtár hiányzik. Nem sikerült használni a rendszerindítással kapcsolatos funkciókat.

String.Target: Dism++需要管理员权限才能运行，请右键 以管理员身份运行 然后继续。
String.Link: Rendszergazdai jogokkal kell rendelkeznie a Dism++ futtatásához. Nyomja meg a jobb egérgombot, és válassza a "Futtatás Rendszergazdaként" parancsot a folytatáshoz.

String.Target: Dism++不允许以兼容模式启动，请去除兼容模式，然后再启动Dism++。
String.Link: A Dism++ nem támogatja a kompatibilitási módot. Tiltsa le a kompatibilitási módot, majd futtassa a Dism++ szolgáltatást.

String.Target: 你需要增量保存还是直接保存？

String.Link: Tipp: A kép mentése után a mérete nem változik meg. Fordítsa újra a célfájlt a méretének csökkentése érdekében.

String.Link: Közvetlen mentés Cserélje ki az eredeti lemezképet ezzel a módosított képpel.

String.Target: %d 秒后将重启计算机，点击取消可以撤销此任务。
String.Link: A számítógép újraindul, %d másodperc múlva. A programhoz való visszatéréshez kattintson a "Mégse" gombra.

String.Target: 当前硬盘可用空间不足，你需要重启并进入RE进行恢复么？

String.Link: A(z) %s programot újra kell indítani. Biztosan folytatja?

String.Target: Dism++由大学时期几个强迫症晚期患者打造，追求最强功能、极致绿色、极小身材。Dism++可以说是一个Dism的GUI版，但是并不依赖Dism，直接基于更底层的CBS(Component Based Servicing Reference)。因此Dism++往往比微软自带的Dism拥有更好的兼容性以及更加轻巧的体积。
String.Link: A világ első, a CBS-en (Component Based Service Reference) alapuló Dism GUI alkalmazása! A Dism++ kompatibilisebb és kisebb méretű, mint a Microsoft saját Dism alkalmazása.
Kérjük, adja meg a lemezkép elérési útját

String.Target: 请在此输入安装路径，比如C:\
String.Link: Kérjük, írja be a lemezkép telepítési útvonalát. Például: C:\

String.Target: 请在此输入挂载路径，比如D:\1
String.Link: Kérjük, írja be a csatolási útvonalat. Például: D:\1
Kérjük, adja meg a lemezkép elérési útját

String.Link: Ez a funkció lehetővé teszi, hogy más fájlok (WIM, ESD, VHD, VHDX), valamint a mappában lévő lemezképek is hozzáadódjanak a képlistához.

String.Target: 映像已经受到致命问题，已经无法修复，请修复安装。

String.Target: 当前系统至少为Windows 8/2012才能正常处理此系统。如果你继续进行，那么打开关闭功能、添加删除更新均可能出现意外失败。
String.Link: Az operációs rendszer verziója nem lehet alacsonyabb, mint a Windows 8/2012. A Windows korábbi verziójának betöltésekor olyan funkciók, mint a "Megnyitás", "Hozzáadás", "Törlés" vagy "Frissítés" nem működnek megfelelően.

String.Link: Probléma(k) merült(ek) föl a feldolgozás során. Sikerült %u, hiba %u, nem alkalmazható %u. Néhány hiba: %s [0x%.8X]. Lásd a "Config\Dism++. Log" fájlt a további információkért.

String.Target: 操作成功，其中成功 %u 个，不适用 %u 个。更多信息请参考 "Config\Dism++.log"
String.Link: A művelet sikerült. Sikerült %u, nem alkalmazható %u. Lásd a "Config\Dism++. Log" fájlt további információkért.

新用户启动项（仅启动一次） —— HKU\DEFAULT\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce

String.Target: 删除Windows store可能导致你未来无法下载或更新Appx，你确定要继续么？

String.Target: 删除Microsoft.XboxIdentityProvider可能导致Windows Store无法使用，你确定要继续么？
String.Link: A Microsoft.XboxIdentityProvider eltávolítása után a Windows áruház nem lesz használható. Biztosan folytatja?

String.Target: %s 等待超时，请尝试使用空间回收 - 过期Appx清理。
String.Link: A(z) %s alkamazás elavult. Próbálja meg használni a "Lemez tisztítás" gombot - az elavult Appx alkalmazás eltvolításához.
Az Appx kezelőfelület nem nyitható meg.

String.Target: %s 无法获取Appx关联的账号信息，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: Nincs információ erről az alkalmazásról %s. Hibakód: 0x%.8X

String.Target: %s 无法获取账号SID，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: Nem sikerült elérni a fiók SID %s értékét. Hibakód: 0x%.8X 0x%.8X

String.Target: %s 所关联的用户（%s）无法删除，错误代码：0x%.8X
String.Link: A(z) %s kapcsolódik egy fiókhoz (%s), és nem törölhető. Hibakód: 0x%.8X
A(z) %s nincs hozzárendelve egyetlen felhasználóhoz sem.

String.Target: 恭喜你删除成功！但是某些应用可能属于Provisioned Appx，如果你遇到某个App所有者是SYSTEM，而且一直删不掉，请在 Provisioned Appx 删除它们。
String.Link: Gratulálunk! A törlés sikeresen befejeződött. Egyes alkalmazások azonban előtelepített Appx alkalmazásokhoz kapcsolódhatnak. Ha szembesül azzal a ténnyel, hogy az alkalmazás tulajdonosa a RENDSZER - használja az "Előre telepítve az Appx rendszeralkalmazásokkal" lehetőséget, hogy eltávolítsd őket.

String.Link: A Microsoft.StorePurchaseApp eltávolítása a Windows Áruházat használhatatlanná teheti. Biztos, hogy folytatja?

请在此输入命令或者程序路径，比如regedit
String.Link: Adjon meg egy parancsot, például regedit

String.Target: 本工具可以让其他程序以无视权限形式运行，本功能可以通过命令行参数调用，详情请参考帮助文档了解具体用法。
String.Link: This tool can run some programs without rights checking. You can invoke this function with command line. Please refer to the document.

String.Target:
/GodMode {Commendline} 春哥附体执行Cmd命令，其命令格式与Cmd用法一致
示例: Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode cmd Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode regedit.exe Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode "\"C:\Windows\notepad.exe\" \"C:\123.txt\""
String.Link:
/GodMode {Commandline} God mode módban parancssor. A használat megegyezik a parancssor használatával.
Examples: Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode cmd Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode regedit.exe Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /GodMode "\"C:\Windows\notepad.exe\" \"C:\123.txt\""

String.Target:
即将以无视权限方式执行此命令： %s
为了避免让恶意软件利用，Dism++需要你的允许才能继续，你确定要继续吗？
String.Link:
A Dism++ futtatja a parancsokat %s
a jogok ellenőrzése nélkül. A Dism++ program, a rosszindulatú programok károkozásának megakadályozása érdekében a megerősítést kér. Biztosan folytatja?

发现新版本，需要更新 %d 个文件，约%s。

String.Link:

Changelog:
%s

String.Target: 更新文件过程中遇到错误，Orz……
Dism++初始化成功，开始执行命令：%s
String.Link: Dism++ initialization successfully, start to execute the command:%s

String.Target: 未正确识别到命令，以下是程序支持的所有命令：
String.Link: Command not found, please check your input. List of all commands supported:

String.Target: 将一个文件夹或者文件进行Compact压缩： /C { /exe [ xpress4k（默认、更佳性能） | xpress8k | xpress16k | lzx（更小体积） ] } Path
String.Link: Compact compress a folder or file(s): /C { /exe [ xpress4k (default, faster) | xpress8k | xpress16k | lzx (smaller) ] } Path

String.Target: 将一个文件夹或者文件进行Compact解压缩 /U Path
String.Link: Decompress the compacted folder or file(s) /U Path

String.Target:
/Image:<path_to_image> - 指定特定 Windows 映像的根目录的路径。
示例： Dism++x86.exe /Image:C:\ /? Dism++x86.exe /Image:"D:\1213\" /?
String.Link:
/Image:<path_to_image> - The path to the root directory of the image.
Examples: Dism++x86.exe /Image:C:\ /? Dism++x86.exe /Image:"D:\1213\" /?

String.Target:
映像管理命令： /All - 打开全局会话 /Image - 指定特定 Windows 映像的根目录的路径。
Compact支持命令： /C - 使用Compact压缩文件/文件夹 /U - 撤销Compact压缩的文件/文件夹
若要获得有关这些 Dism++ 选项及其参数的详细信息，请在紧挨着 /? 之前指定一个选项。 示例： Dism++x86.exe /Image /? Dism++x86.exe /C /?
String.Link:
Image Management Command: /All - Open the global session /Image - Designate the root directory of windows image
Compact supported command /C - Use the compressed files/folders (compressed with compact) /U - Revoke the compressed files/folders (compressed with compact)
For more information about these Dism++ options and their arguments, specify an option immediately before /?. Example: Dism++x86.exe /Image /? Dism++x86.exe /C /?

String.Target:
/Plugin:<Plugin_ID> - 此功能用于打开某插件支持的命令
示例： Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /?
String.Link:
/Plugin:<Plugin_ID> - To run the commands supported with a plug-in.
Examples: Dism++x86.exe /All /Plugin:{4d420a2e-ea11-450a-b8a0-ab8ca7772043} /?

String.Target:
可以使用以下命令来操作此映像：
插件命令： /Plugin - 启动特定插件（需要插件支持命令参数）
String.Link:
You can use these commands to operate this image:
Command: /Plugin - Run the designated plug-in (Need plugin support)

String.Target: 当前模式不支持引导修复以及格式化分区，你需要重启并进入RE进行恢复么？
String.Link: Current mode can not use boot repair or format partition. Do you want to restart to WinRE for recovery?

String.Target: 格式化分区 %s 失败，错误代码：%d。
String.Link: Format the partition %s failed, error code:%d.

String.Target: Dism++与此操作系统处于同一分区，无法进行格式化。
String.Link: Dism++ and the OS are on the same partition. Cannot format the partition.

String.Target: 当前其他任务正在进行，请稍等……
String.Link: Other tasks are running currently, please wait...

String.Target: 清理被取代的组件并减少组件存储的大小。
String.Link: Use it to clean up the superseded components and reduce the size of the component store.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载更新，如果有卸载更新需求请勿使用此选项。
String.Link: The installed Windows Updates cannot be uninstalled after the operation is completed.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载更新，此外ResetBase模式跟系统重置功能有冲突，如果有卸载更新或者系统重置需求请勿使用此选项。
String.Link: Updates cannot be uninstalled after cleaning up. In addition, ResetBase mode conflicts with system reset function. Please do not use this option if you have such needs.

String.Target: 删除计算机中不使用的驱动程序以节省驱动存储池空间。
String.Link: Delete unused drivers to save spaces.

String.Target: 该功能对于某些精简系统或者手动处理过驱动的系统可能发生驱动签名问题。
String.Link: Perhaps this function will lead driver signature problem in some simplified systems or manual-processed-driver systems.

String.Target: 使用利用NTFS硬链接特性合并所有文件内容相同的文件。
String.Link: Use NTFS hard link to merge all the same-content-file.

String.Target: 某些文件被硬链接合并后可能导致相关功能无法正常使用。
String.Link: Some files merged will not work normally properly.

String.Target: 对单纯读取的文件进行哈夫曼压缩，在不影响性能的情况下，显著减少系统体积。特别感谢矿工以及所有Compact团队成员无私的支持与帮助。
String.Link: Compree the read-only file with Huffman compression, it will not impact the performance, reduce the volume of the system evidently. Special thanks to the miners and the selfless support and aid of the member of compact team.

String.Target: 使用后可能导致某些程序无法正常运行甚至让系统无法启动，如果使用后出现问题，可以在PE中点击 恢复功能-->撤销Compact。
String.Link: After applying this, some programs will malfunction, and the system might fail to start. You can later fix this by using "Revovery" > "Never Compact" in WinPE.

String.Target: 此功能与某些硬盘备份软件不兼容。如果使用后出现问题，可以点击 恢复功能-->撤销Compact。
String.Link: This function is not compatible with some backup software. If you encounter problems, click "Recovery" > "Never Compact".

String.Target: 在Appx应用升级时，会留下老版本应用，该功能将删除那些不使用的老版本。
String.Link: When updating an Appx, it will not delete the older versions. This function can delete the unused older versions (beta feature, may lead metro app unstartable.

String.Target: 少数用户报告称使用后无法打开Appx应用，需要重新安装Appx应用。
String.Link: A few users said after use it, Appx cannot run. They need to reinstall Appx.

String.Target: 此功能将移除所有系统自带Appx应用，移除后可以在Windows应用商店重新下载他们。
String.Link: This function removes all system embedded Appx. You can download them again from Windows Store.

String.Target: 系统更新时在WinSxS里面产生的临时文件。
String.Link: When system updating, system make the temp files.

String.Target: Windows在下载更新以及更新Metro应用时会在这里产生临时安装包。
String.Link: When windows downloading updates or updating metro apps, system make temp installation packages in here

String.Target: 一些程序为特定用户产生的临时文件。
String.Link: Temp files of one specific user.

String.Target: 当程序遇到某些问题时，系统会在这里留下稳定性报告，建议你定期清理。
String.Link: When the programs have some problems, the system will left a stability report here, I recommended you clean the stability report annually.

String.Target: 常见的驱动临时解压目录
String.Link: common temp extract directory for drivers

String.Target: Intel、AMD以及Nvidia驱动在安装时留下的解压目录。
String.Link: When Intel , AMD and Nvidia drivers installing, they made the extracted directory.

String.Target: Terminal Server Client运行时产生的一些缓存文件。
String.Link: When Terminal Server Client running, Terminal Server Client made the cache.

String.Target: 在系统升级或者还原后留下的系统备份。
String.Link: When system upgrading or restoring, system made the backup.

String.Target: 删除后你将无法回滚到以前安装的系统。
String.Link: After deleting, you cannot restore to the earlier system.

String.Target: 在系统升级或者还原后留下的系统临时安装文件，如果你确定当前没有进行系统升级或者还原，那么可以安全删除。
String.Link: When system upgrading or restoring, system made the backup. If you ensure you did not upgrade or restore system, you can delete the backup.

String.Target: QQ运行时产生的临时文件还有日志，不影响QQ消息记录，建议定期删除。
String.Link: When QQ running, QQ made the temp files and log files. I recommend you delete them regularly.

String.Target: YY运行时产生的一些临时文件以及日志，建议定期删除。
String.Link: When YY running, YY made the temp files and log files. I recommend you delete them regularly.

String.Target: 使用Installer技术的安装程序产生的缓存。
可能导致卸载Office、VM等应用程序需要安装包。
String.Link: May lead to uninstall Office, VM applications. You need installation package.

String.Target: 安装Visual Studio后产生的安装源，如果不需要卸载VS可以考虑删除。
String.Link: After you installing visual studio, the program made the installation source. If you do not need to uninstall visual studio, you can consider to delete.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载只能升级安装或者强行删除。
String.Link: After cleaning you cannot uninstall. You can only upgrade or force delete.

String.Target: 安装Office后产生的安装源，如果不需要卸载Office可以考虑删除，删除后能正常安装Office更新。
String.Link: After you installing office, the program made the installation source. If you do not need to uninstall office, you can consider to delete. After deleting you can install the upgrades normally.

String.Target: 清理后将无法卸载只能升级安装或者强行删除，Office 2007以下版本（包含）删除后还影响安装更新。
String.Link: After cleaning, you can only upgrade to newer version or force delete. If you installed office2007 or earlier version, it will impact office install updates.

String.Target: 腾讯相关软件下载目录
腾讯相关软件更新时会在此留下残留。
String.Link: When Tencent softwares updating, they will leave residue.

String.Target: WP开发时保存的一些虚拟机状态文件，不建议频繁清理此条目。
String.Link: When WP developing, WP saved some virtual machine state files. We do not recommend to clean them frequently.

String.Target: 修改启动信息后系统会创建备份，方便回滚。如果确定不需要还原则可以删除。
String.Link: After you changing the startup information, system creates the backup, easy to change back. If you don't need to change back it, you can delete.

String.Target: 调试程序时创建的符号缓存，不建议频繁清理此条目。

String.Link: Checking this, you will not be able to use any restore point created before the cleaning. Better not to check if you need to use previous restore points!

String.Target: 该项目清理WD，MSE，SCEP等微软系安软的无用文件
String.Link: It will clean up Microsoft Antimalware's useless files (I.e. WD, MSE and SCEP)

String.Target: Package Cache目录存放以WIX为基础的安装程序的安装源
String.Link: It will clean up the Package Cache folder. Package Cache folder stores the installation sources used by WIX-based installer.

String.Target: 清理后基于WIX的安装程序例如VS可以正常卸载；但升级、修复、增添组件需要联网或者备好安装镜像
String.Link: After cleaning, you can still use WIX-Based uninstaller normally (for example the one in Visual Studio), but you will need an Internet connection or to have an offline source when you upgrade, repair or modify the application

String.Target: 使用Visual Studio所产生的日志
(这是一个实验性功能)清理后将无法卸载被取代的msp更新，如果有卸载更新需求请勿使用此选项。
String.Link: (Experimental) After cleaning, replaced msp updates cannot be uninstalled. If you may need to uninstall updates plese do not use this option.

MessageTable.xC1420128: The specified image handle was not opened with the correct access level. In order to mount an image handle, the handle must have WIM_GENERIC_MOUNT access.
MessageTable.xC1420130: The user attempted to mount a split wim. This is unsupported.
MessageTable.xC1420131: The user attempted to mount to the root of a volume. This is unsupported.
MessageTable.xC1420132: The version of wimgapi used to create this mount directory does not match the current version. Ensure that wimserv.exe, wimmount.sys and imagex.exe/wimgapi.dll are of matching version.
MessageTable.xC1420134: The drive of the specified mount path is not supported. Please mount to a volume on a fixed drive.
MessageTable.xC1420135: The mount operation failed. When mounting, you must disable any software (for example, antivirus or search indexer) that accesses files under that specified mount path.
MessageTable.xC143010D: An invalid image index was specified to the wim container wrapper. The wrapper cannot open an image.
MessageTable.xC1440129: The specified log file exists and is not a unicode encoded text file. Only unicode encoded text files are supported.
MessageTable.xC144012F: [ WARN ] The extended attribute on file %1 was ignored.

User Agreement
Chuyu team strongly recommends every user to read the following user agreement (hereinafter referred to as "agreement", or "this agreement") carefully before using Dism++. Anyone chooses not to comply with or fail to understand the intended meaning of the agreement should not be allowed, nor be granted the right granted by Chuyu team to use Dism++. Anyone who uses Dism++ is considered to agree with the following agreement, and to comply with the content of this agreement.
This agreement defines the rights and obligations between Dism++ users of "Dism++" software service (hereinafter referred to as "service", or "this service") and Chuyu team. "Users", and "Dism++ users" refer to individuals who register, login, or utilize this service. This agreement is subject to updates from Chuyu team at any possible moment. Updated agreement, once published in any format, replaces the original agreement. Dism++ should display the updated agreement when the software properly initiates. Dism++ users must stop using this software and the services fom Chuyu team immediately if they choose not to comply with the updated agreement.
I. Rights and Obligations
1. Dism++ users can only use Dism++ for personal use in their PC(s). Any non-personal use (including but not limited to commercial or occupational use) without written approval from Chuyu team is not allowed. 2. Dism++ users must read this agreement and other content in the document of Dism++ carefully before using Dism++. 3. Dism++ users have the obligation to report bugs and possible improvements to Chuyu team. Anyone who uses Dism++ for over 30 days should send mingkuang a "Dism++ usage report" that is no less than 345 words. Anyone who uses Dism++ for 8 mounths or longer should send mingkuang an annual report (at least 520 words) on the topic "Suggestion and possible improvement on Dism++" on November 11th (local time). Email of mingkuang: mingkuang@live.com. 4. Dism++ users should retain the love for peace, for group work, and of helping others. 5. Dism++ users should comply with the Basic Law (or local equivalents). Any action that violates copyright of Chuyu team or this agreement (including but not limited to inappropriately copy, propagate, display, mirror, upload, download, modify), and those that negatively impact Chuyu team's operation or services will be subject to serious legal actions. 6. Anyone who fail to comply with this agreement automatically loses any right granted by Chuyu team. Chuyu team retain right to stop all software of Chuyu team in their PC(s), to reject any of their proposal(s), and to persue legal actions gainst them. 7. Chuyu team will try their best to provide technical support for those who comply with this agreement, when all of the following factors permit: the complexity of issue, the availability of Chuyu team, and the other users' vote.
II. Privacy Issues
1. After initiation, Dism++ will collect Dism++ users' system information (including but not restricted to the system version, system structure, system language, CPU information, RAM information), and Dism++'s own report (including but not restricted to the system crash dump and log files) to improve the service. Dism++ will not collect user identification information nor user's contact information. 2. Chuyu team may send users invitations for testing Dism++, invitations for voting to help Chuyu team's decisioning, and software updates, but Chuyu team will never send messages that include but not limited to advertisements, promotions, frauds, or request for payment.
III. Bear The Risks
1. Chuyu team have an open-type attitude so everyone can let Dism++ better. Some functions may lead unknown aftermath so Chuyu team will remove the possible risk and tell the users. But we didn't solve all the issue. You must bear all the aftermath yourself. Please tell Chuyu team after you find some problems to prevent others have the problems. 2. Please understand and agree because our softwares need to develop. Chuyu team persists the rights to change or pause or end or revoke all or some service. The users need to bear this danger.
IV. Intellectual Property Rights Statement
1. Chuyu team has all the intellectual property rights of this-service content (including but not limited to program, webpage, text and so on) 2. If no important clauses,Chuyu team has all the intellectual property rights. 3. If Chuyu team didn't consent in writing, the users cannot process Chuyu softwares anyway. Cannot tell others have the rights to proces Chuyu softwares. 4. Above and other intellectual property rights of Chuyu team are protected by law. If Chuyu team didn't allow you, you cannot disassemble or do others.
V. Legal Responsibility
1. If Chuyu team see someone report some users breached this agreement,Chuyu team have the rights to ban the users to use Chuyu softwares without informing. 2. Please understand and agree. Chuyu team have the rights to reasonably penalize the violation behavior with law. 3. Please understand and agree. If the users breach this agreement lead third party arise the claim (including the reasonable money to lawyer). The users must compensate for Chuyu team.
VI. Others
1. Chuyu team solemnly tell the users notice the clauses of exempt the responsibility of Chuyu team and the rights of limit the users. Minors should read this agreement with the legal guardians. 2. The agreement validity and explanation apply in Chinese law. If the users and Chuyu team have disputes, negotiated settlement first. If it's failed, please agree to report the having-jurisdiction people's court to administer. 3. If the agreement clauses be invalid or not executable because of whatever reason, the other clauses are still valid. Binding upon Both. 4. The user agreement written in Chinese Simplified should be referred to if the Chinese Simplified version differs from user agreements written in other languages.
